name: ai-quiz
description: Interactive Quiz Platform with AWS Infrastructure

scripts.deploy:backend: docker build -t quiz-app . && aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin YOUR_ECR_REPO && docker tag quiz-app:latest YOUR_ECR_REPO:latest && docker push YOUR_ECR_REPO:latest
scripts.deploy:infra: cd cdk-app && npm run build && cdk deploy
